        public void updateInventoryItems()

      • getNextItem

        public InventoryItem getNextItem(InventoryItem ignore,
                                 int... itemIDs)
        Retrieves the next inventory item with the given id(s) ignoring an inventory item specified. Useful in situations when trying to speed-drop and wanting to cut-down time from client->server communication lag; hovering, ect.
        Parameters:
        ignore -
        ids -
        Returns:
        the next item
